About Me

Let me tell you all about me.

BIO

I am an experienced Full Stack Engineer with practical experience in the Engineering Industry. I have skills in Front-End Web Development, User Experience and User Interface Design, Back-End Web Development and Team leadership.

Andela

Software Engineer

I worked on various Andela products that required me to take on a Full stack role and these products include Wger, Authors' Haven, Landville.

China Railway Seventh Group

Senior Engineering Assistant

I worked as a Team Lead for a field placed technical team that was responsible for carrying out quality tests on site and to ensure quality work and specifications are maintained.

Coder Corp

Software Developer

Coder Corp is a christian based technology solutions firm that provides digital solutions to Christian based organizations. I worked as part of the team that created and maintained the Back-end API for the various products as well as building UI/UX features for sites the firm was handling.
